This allows individuals, businesses, and institutions to install solar systems without the burden of upfront costs. What is Residential Solar Financing Solar financing is a way to make solar energy installations affordable by providing financial support through loans or payment plans. This allows individuals, businesses, and institutions to install solar systems without the burden of upfront costs. Solar loan options, such as easy EMIs or no-cost EMI plans, help customers spread the cost of their solar system over time while enjoying the immediate benefits of lower electricity bills and contributing to a greener planet. Learn more

We use cookies Credit Fair uses cookies, pixel tags and similar technologies to enhance your experience on this website and the way it functions for you as a visitor. A cookie is a text file that is stored on your device. We use these text files for operation of our website, our own analytical purposes and to personalize content. If you object to cookies or want to delete any cookies that are already stored on your computer, you should follow the instructions for deleting existing cookies and disabling future cookies on your web browser or equivalent software. Remember, if you do disable or delete cookies, your experience on the website will be hampered. Read the complete privacy policy here. paragraphs.text: Unlock affordable solar financing for your home, business, or community. Let's build a sustainable future together
Save big on bills, and go green with an easy rooftop solar loan solution for your home.
Power your business with solar and cut costs, reduce your footprint, and grow sustainably!
Cut costs, embrace sustainability, and build a greener community for the future!
Enjoy the benefits of green & clean energy with easy and affordable EMI options, where your EMIs are less than Electricity Cost.
Protect your solar investment with comprehensive insurance coverage, ensuring peace of mind.
Experience the convenience of a completely online process from application to approval with no paperwork.
Switch to Solar Today and generate your own electricity for the next 25 years.
We are officially registered as financial partners of the PM Surya Ghar initiative, supporting solar adoption across India.
Trusted and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India, ensuring reliability and transparency in our services.
Urban to Rural We cover it all
Our rooftop solar loan is accessible to a wide audience, ensuring a seamless financing experience wherever you are.

Solar financing is a way to make solar energy installations affordable by providing financial support through loans or payment plans. This allows individuals, businesses, and institutions to install solar systems without the burden of upfront costs. Solar loan options, such as easy EMIs or no-cost EMI plans, help customers spread the cost of their solar system over time while enjoying the immediate benefits of lower electricity bills and contributing to a greener planet.
Get competitive interest rates to make solar financing budget-friendly.
Choose repayment tenures that suit your financial flexibility.
Enjoy hassle-free and quick approvals to get started with your solar journey.
Transparent financing with no hidden charges ensures peace of mind.
“Switching to solar was the best decision we made! Reliable power and big savings. Thank you for making it so easy!”
“Flexible EMIs made solar affordable for us. Credit Fair turned our dream of going solar into reality!”
“Exceptional service and seamless process! Highly recommend it to anyone looking for a hassle-free experience.”
See why customers and businesses in over 80 Indian cities trust us. Try our services today!
902, Tower A, Naman Midtown, Senapati Bapat Marg, Mumbai 400013
